statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 5 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -2 \\ -6 \\ 5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 5 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ -28 \\ 18 \\ -14 \\ 31 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 5 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -2 \\ -6 \\ 5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 5 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ -28 \\ 18 \\ -14 \\ 31 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
